import { useContext, useState } from "react" import { ShopContext } from "../Context/ShopContext" import { Link } from "react-router-dom" export const Values = ( { CEP, cupom, frete } ) =>{ const { priceProducts } = useContext(ShopContext) const [desconto2, setDesconto] = useState(0) let percentual = 0.10; let desconto = priceProducts * percentual; let novoPreco = priceProducts - desconto; funcaoAleatoria() //console.log(cep) //console.log(cupomDeDesconto) return(

Resumo do Pedido

Subtotal

R$: {priceProducts}

Entrega

R$: {frete}

Cupom de desconto

-R$: {desconto2}

Total

R$: {priceProducts}

R$: {priceProducts}

R$: {novoPreco}

Valor com 10% de desconto no Boleto ou PIX

) } /* R$: {cupomDeDesconto > 0 ? ( novoPreco ) : ( priceProducts )} */
